description: CHA - Bekesy Highest Audible Frequency Audiometry

ToneRepetitionInterval.description: Rate tones are presented, in ms. Overrides default inheritted from `audiometryProperties` properties

L0.description: Nominal test level in dB SPL.  Allowable range for test level should be from the minimum to the maximum of the levels defined in the calibration table.

ReversalKeep.description: Reversals to keep, must be even

IncrementStartMultiplierFrequency.description: Increment until ReversalDiscard: multiply this by IncrementNominalFrequency

IncrementNominalFrequency.description: Frequency increment after first reversal, units = Octave

IncrementStartMultiplierLevel.description: Increment until ReversalDiscard: multiply this by IncrementNominalLevel

IncrementNominalLevel.description: Level increment after first reversal, in dB

MinimumOutputLevel.description: Minimum level that could be presented during exam, in dB SPL.  Default set by calibration.  Allowable range for test level should be from the minimum to the maximum of the levels defined in the calibration table.
